TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 为应用程序快速开发 (RAD) 设计器提供支持，以便分析使用 XPath 表达式的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to parse data-binding expressions that use XPath expressions.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此类的重载 方法绑定到针对实现 接口（如 ）的对象执行的 XPath 表达式的结果。You can use the overloaded method of this class to bind to the result of an XPath expression executed against an object that implements the interface, such as an . 您可以使用 方法检索针对 对象执行的 XPath 表达式的结果，作为节点 列表。You can use the method to retrieve the results of an XPath expression executed against an object as an list of nodes. 可以直接枚举此节点列表，或将其分配给列表控件的 `DataSource` 属性，如 或 。This list of nodes can be enumerated directly or assigned to the `DataSource` property of a list control, such as a or . 以声明方式使用 方法时，可以使用数据绑定语法的简化版本。You can use a simplified version of data-binding syntax when using the methods declaratively. 您可以使用 `XPath`（`xpath`），而不是调用 `XPathBinder.Eval`（`Container.DataItem``xpath`）。Instead of calling `XPathBinder.Eval`(`Container.DataItem`, `xpath`) you can use `XPath`(`xpath`). 同样，您可以使用 `XPathSelect`（`xpath`）来检索 节点集，而不是调用 `XPathBinder.Select`（`Container.DataItem`，`xpath`）。Similarly, instead of calling `XPathBinder.Select`(`Container.DataItem`,`xpath`), you can use `XPathSelect`(`xpath`) to retrieve an set of nodes. 使用此简化的语法时， 和 方法将采用默认的 `Container.DataItem` 上下文对象。When using this simplified syntax, the and methods assume a default `Container.DataItem` context object. 有关 ASP.NET 服务器控件的数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about data binding to ASP.NET server controls, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与模板化 控件结合使用来显示 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: - 显示 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含数据的 XML 文件。An XML file that contains the data. 该示例的第一部分显示一个 Web 窗体页，该页显示通过 控件访问的 XML 数据。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. 控件使用简化 方法语法来绑定到 所表示的 XML 文档中的数据项。A control uses simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它使用 方法检索 列表，并将其分配为 控件的后期绑定 属性。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/CS/xmlds14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/VB/xmlds14vb.aspx#1)] 第二个示例提供 XML 文件的 XML 文件，该文件用作上面定义的 Web 窗体页中显示的数据源。The second example provides the XML file, Order.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` John Doe 1234 Tenth Avenue Bellevue Washington 98001 screwdriver hammer fixture ```

summary.span: 在运行时对 对象分析和计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Parses and evaluates an XPath data-binding expression against an object at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string xPath);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string xPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, xPath As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ xPath);
static member Eval : obj * string -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 计算表达式所根据的 对象引用。

span.span: The object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: xPath
param.span: 从 到放置在绑定控件属性中的属性值的 XPath 查询。

span.span: The XPath query from to the property value that is placed in the bound control property.

summary.span: 在运行时计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是数据绑定表达式的计算结果。

span.span: An that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要简化将 XML 节点转换为要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串，可以通过声明方式使用 方法。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed on a browser. 为此，必须将 \<% # 和% > 标记，这些标记也用于数据绑定表达式周围的标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如 、或 ，`container` 参数应 `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应将 `container` 参数 `Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与模板化 控件结合使用来显示 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: - 显示 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含数据的 XML 文件。An XML file that contains the data. 该示例的第一部分显示一个 Web 窗体页，该页显示通过 控件访问的 XML 数据。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. 控件使用简化的 方法语法来绑定到 所表示的 XML 文档中的数据项。A control uses the simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它使用 方法检索 列表，并将其分配为 控件的后期绑定 属性。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/CS/xmlds13cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/VB/xmlds13vb.aspx#1)] 第二个示例提供 XML 文件 Bookstore2，该文件用作上面定义的 Web 窗体页中显示的数据源。The second example provides the XML file, Bookstore2.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` test test2 The Handmaid's Tale 12.95 test3 test4 Pride And Prejudice 24.95 ```

param.span: .NET Framework 格式字符串，类似于 所用的字符串，可以将 对象（是数据绑定表达式的计算结果）转换为可由请求浏览器显示的 。

span.span: A .NET Framework format string, similar to those used by , that converts the object (which results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression) to a that can be displayed by the requesting browser.

summary.span: 在运行时计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式，并将结果格式化为要在请求浏览器中显示的文本。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as text to be displayed in the requesting browser.

returns.span: ，通过计算数据绑定表达式并转换为字符串类型得出。

span.span: A that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要详细了解 .NET Framework 中的格式字符串，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。To learn more about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 如果要简化将 XML 节点转换为要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串，可以通过声明方式使用 方法。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 为此，必须将 \<% # 和% > 标记，这些标记也用于数据绑定表达式周围的标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如 、或 ，`container` 参数应 `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应将 `container` 参数 `Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

summary.span: 使用指定用来解析 XPath 表达式中的命名空间前缀的 对象，在运行时评估 XPath 数据绑定表达式，并将结果格式化为文本以便显示在请求浏览器中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要简化将 XML 节点转换为要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串，可以通过声明方式使用 方法。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 为此，必须将 \<% # 和% > 标记，这些标记也用于数据绑定表达式周围的标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 数据绑定表达式包含 XPath 表达式和 对象以解析命名空间引用。The data-binding expression includes the XPath expression and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如 、或 ，`container` 参数应 `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应将 `container` 参数 `Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要简化将 XML 节点转换为要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串，可以通过声明方式使用 方法。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 为此，必须将 \<% # 和% > 标记，这些标记也用于数据绑定表达式周围的标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 数据绑定表达式包含 XPath 表达式和 对象以解析命名空间引用。The data-binding expression includes the XPath expression and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如 、或 ，`container` 参数应 `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页面进行绑定，应将 `container` 参数 `Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要简化使用 XPath 查询的一组节点的检索，可以通过声明方式使用 方法。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the retrieval of a set of nodes using an XPath query. 为此，必须将 \<% # 和% > 标记（这些标记也用于标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定，如 XPath 查询和 对象）来解析命名空间引用。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the XPath query and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如 、或 ，`container` 参数应 `Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`.
